title: Hard Knocks Detroit Lions: Episode 1 Recap
itunes:title: Hard Knocks Detroit Lions: Episode 1 Recap
description:
Dan Hanzus and Colleen Wolfe recap the season premiere of Hard Knocks: Training Camp with the Detroit Lions. We begin the podcast discussing the star of the episode, head coach Dan Campbell, and the vibes he brings to the Lions. We touch on Jamaal Williams' passionate speech breaking down the team huddle, and rookie Aiden Hutchinson's performance of the iconic Michael Jackson song Billie Jean. After the break, Dan and Colleen cover their favorite quotes from the episode, where Jamaal Williams again shines. Then, we dig into the coaching staff featured, focusing especially on the relationship between Duce Staley and Aaron Glenn. Next, Dan reveals his "Liev Schreiber Quote of the Week," and the hosts make plot-line predictions for next week. Finally, we wrap up the show with the Episode MVP voting.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
